Package com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.swing

Main Swing component classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PJComponentTextParser
    Parses widget text labels for optional mnemonics, e.g., "Save &As...".
    PJDialogMouseDragHelper  
    PKeyStrokeUtils
    Collection of static methods for KeyStroke.
    PSwingDebug  
    PSwingUtils
    Collection of static methods that builds upon SwingUtilities.
    SwingSample  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PHorizontalAlignment
    Constants used for widget horizontal alignment.
    PInputEventModifier
    Key and mouse button modifiers used for input events.
    PInputEventModifier.ModifierType
    Denotes the type of modifier: PInputEventModifier.ModifierType.KEY or PInputEventModifier.ModifierType.MOUSE_BUTTON
    PJDialogMouseDragHelper.CursorChangeTarget  
    PJDialogMouseDragHelper.CursorChangeTrigger  
    PVerticalAlignment
    Constants used for widget vertical alignment.

Package com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.swing Description

Main Swing component classes. All class names begin with the letter 'P' for 'Papaya'.

This package is a part of the open-source Papaya Swing library.
